snippet.title: One Box One Goal - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the latest trailer for One Box One Goal! 

This is not your average rage game. Inspired by the brutal difficulty of Getting Over It, our game takes the challenge to the next dimension, literally! With 3D gameplay, you'll navigate your box through a chaotic, physics-defying world filled with traps, obstacles, and frustration.

In this trailer, we’re excited to showcase brand-new mechanics that make the gameplay smoother, more accurate, and way more fun (or infuriating, depending on your skills 😉). The old mechanics served their purpose but were outdated and far from perfect. With this update, we’ve reimagined how you interact with the world, adding new tools and physics-based controls to push your limits.

Will you reach the goal? 

Wishlist the game now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2541550/One_Box_One_Goal/

Join the discord server of the game:
https://discord.gg/Tb7k3YfR9B

#OneBoxOneGoal #IndieGame #GettingOverIt #PhysicsGame #gamingtrailer
